processing_time_months.notes: Can vary significantly based on embassy workload and time of year.

financial_requirements.notes: Must show sufficient funds to cover tuition, living expenses, and other costs for the first year of study. May need to show evidence of funding for subsequent years.

loan_process.notes: Education loans from recognized banks are generally accepted as proof of funds. Ensure the loan covers the estimated cost of attendance.

additional_requirements: Acceptance letter from a SEVP-certified school

processing_time_months.notes: Processing times can fluctuate. Apply well in advance.

financial_requirements.notes: Must show funds to cover course fees for the first year and living expenses for up to 9 months.

required_documents_summary: Proof of the loan being approved and available
Confirmation that the loan is specifically for education
loan_process.notes: Loans must be from banks regulated by the home regulator (e.g., RBI in India).

additional_requirements: Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies (CAS) from a licensed sponsor

processing_time_months.notes: Highly dependent on the stream and individual circumstances.

financial_requirements.notes: Need to demonstrate funds to cover the first year's living costs, travel costs, and course fees. Evidence of funds for subsequent years may be required.

required_documents_summary: Details of the loan amount and tenure
loan_process.notes: Loans from recognized financial institutions are generally acceptable. Ensure the loan amount is sufficient.
